General.Name: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar AS
General.Description: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi engages in the tourism business in Turkey and internationally. It invests, builds, and operates hotels, resorts, golf, restaurants, cafeterias, casinos and entertainment venues, beaches, amusement parks, marinas, yacht berths, tourist goods sales points, and regulation schools and related facilities. The company operates Club Zigana holiday village and Zigana Hotel resort. In addition, it offers tourism transport and car rental services, as well as acts as a travel agent. Further, the company operates stores, showrooms, and warehouses in ports and free zones. Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
